content: I keep getting an error from the test code cases. Shouldn't the expected = ['world', 'hello']
subject: Test Case Error?

content:
get_most_frequent_words is supposed to return the words with the highest frequency. So, in this case, 'world' has a combined frequency of 7, while 'hello' has a combined frequency of 2. Since, 'world' has the combined highest frequency, it should only return ['hello'].

You should only return more than one word in the case where the combined highest frequency is tied. In such a case, you will return all the words with the combined highest frequency, sorted in alphabetical order
